column1: # Title: Electricity technology capital costs (ATB Version)
# ATB costs for 2015 are based on NREL ATB 2017 data except in some cases where the 2015 cost is lower than the 2020 costs and the costs in other periods are trending down.
# Note that some technologies in ATB have the same cost for multiple variations (e.g. Coal
column2: Gas) and for them only one variation is represented.
